description: Try our easy to follow Pork With Rum Sauce & Kale Coleslaw recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: BBQ pork,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Microwave,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Kale,Pork,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Pork With Rum Sauce & Kale Coleslaw Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g simply heat slow cooked pork brisket with brown sugar & rum BBQ sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Remove pork from packet (reserving sauce) and place into an ovenproof dish. Heat for 25 minutes. Pour the contents of the sauce sachet evenly over the meat and cook for a further 15 minutes.
Meanwhile, mix slaw with dressing sachet. Set aside. Steam or microwave corn for 2 minutes until tender.
Slice pork and serve with slaw and corn.
